description: The Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi and President Mr. Francois Hollande paid a joint visit to the Government Museum and Art Gallery in Chandigarh, as part of their engagements during the State Visit of President Hollande to India on 24 January 2016. The two Leaders viewed the displays of archaeol…
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Viewed displays of archaeological findings from foothills of the Himalayas with President François Hollandehollande at the Government Museum & Art Gallery. The displays are result of years of hardwork between Indian & French researchers. Such exchanges are a special aspect of India-French ties. 

Infact, the research work relating to this archaeological discovery is being published in the Palevol Review. http://nm-4.com/kg6c
